org.pac4j.core.client

Class IndirectClientV2<C extends Credentials,U extends CommonProfile>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pac4j.core.util.InitializableWebObject
      • org.pac4j.core.client.BaseClient<C,U>
        • org.pac4j.core.client.IndirectClient<C,U>
          • org.pac4j.core.client.IndirectClientV2<C,U>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Client<C,U>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CasClient, CasProxyReceptor, FormClient, IndirectBasicAuthClient, OidcClient

    public abstract class IndirectClientV2<C extends Credentials,U extends CommonProfile>
extends IndirectClient<C,U>
    New indirect client type using the RedirectActionBuilder, CredentialsExtractor, Authenticator and ProfileCreator concepts.
    Since:
    1.9.0
    Author:
    Jerome Leleu
